mainText:
I'm so sad to have never met him personally, he's a man of substance beyond anyone else in existence.

Not a day goes by I don't think about Steve, and I say that honestly. Every time I boot up my Mac and hear that iconic "bong," I think of him. He's been my inspiration, and will always be.

Please, rest happily knowing you've changed the world, forever. You've made every day just a little more fun.
author: Kody
